idea-plugin.name: Hoshi Theme

idea-plugin.change-notes:
[1.0.3]

Added

  • light mode (experimental)

[1.0.2]

Added

  • colors for:
    • tooltips;
    • notifications;
    • console bg;
    • documentation bgs;
    • checkboxes;
    • radio buttons.
  • better documentation.

[1.0.1]

Added

  • compatibility with newer IDE versions

[1.0.0]

Added

  • Initial scaffold created from IntelliJ Platform Plugin Template
